title: Writing — Summarize Written Text 1
promptText: Read the passage about renewable energy adoption and write a one-sentence summary capturing its main point.

title: Writing — Summarize Written Text 2
promptText: Summarize the paragraph on the impact of public transportation on urban mobility in a single concise sentence.

title: Writing — Summarize Written Text 3
promptText: Write a one-sentence summary of the provided text discussing the role of data privacy regulations in product analytics.

title: Writing — Write Essay 1
promptText: Some people believe remote work increases productivity, while others argue it reduces collaboration. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

title: Writing — Write Essay 2
promptText: To what extent do you agree or disagree that governments should prioritize public transport over private vehicle infrastructure?

title: Writing — Write Essay 3
promptText: Do the benefits of stricter data privacy laws outweigh the potential limitations they impose on innovation? Provide reasons and examples.
